page.title: 24The Village Library
page.content:
Witterings Library provides a book lending service to the whole community. It is a fun place to visit. The library has an adult section, children's section, computers for accessing the internet or doing homework, and even a computer for pre school children to play on.

The library offers lots of other services such as Jiggle and rhyme, Knit and knatter, delivery of books to people's homes and there is always a friendly welcome.
Contribution by: The children of East Wittering School
